message: I propose a fair deal - 90% for me, 10% for you. This way we both get a good share and can move on with our lives. What do you say?
I believe a 55/45 split is fairer, considering we both have an equal chance of being the proposer in the next round. Let's call it a day.
Okay, I understand your perspective. How about a 60/40 split? I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a bigger share to make this worthwhile for me.
